Singer-songwriter Don McLean has announced that he‚Äôs dropping out from performing at the National Rifle Association‚Äôs annual meeting this weekend in Houston, saying it would be ‚Äúdisrespectful and hurtful‚Äù to perform days after 19 children and two adults were killed in a mass shooting in the state‚Ä¶
